name: Best of the Best Trivia Game | Classic Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: 'Gone With The Wind': Often considered to be the best movie of all-time. What was distinctive about Rhett's lady friend, Belle?
questions.explanation:
Her hair color.

	Bright red hair. What can you say about the movie that hasn't been said before?

questions.text: Western: 'Shane'. Who played the role of a 'bad guy' who changes his way toward the end of the movie?
questions.explanation:
Ben Johnson.

	Veteran Western star Johnson repents at the end and helps Shane after Palance shoots Cook . Excellent movie. I give the edge to it over 'High Noon'.

questions.text: Musical: West Side Story'. Who played the nasty cop?
questions.explanation:
Simon Oakland.

	Glass was the storeowner. Tamblyn was 'Riff'. Chakiris was 'Bernardo'. Everything was well-done. ('Cabaret' had great music, but the story was so-so.)

questions.text: Swashbuckler: 'Adventures of Robin Hood'. How is Robin Hood lured into a trap?
questions.explanation:
Archery Contest.

	In order to win a golden arrow from Maid Marian (Olivia de Havilland). Great fun. Slight edge over 'Ivanhoe' and 'Captain Blood'.

questions.text: Sci-Fi: 'Time Machine'. Who plays Rod Taylor's loyal friend?
questions.explanation:
Alan Young.

	Before 'Mr Ed'. Easy entertainment.

questions.text: Suspense: 'Vertigo'. Where does the story take place?
questions.explanation:
San Francisco.

	Jimmy Stewart pulls Kim Novak out of San Francisco Bay. I give the edge to this over 'Birds', 'Dial M for Murder', To Catch a Thief' and 'North by Northwest'.

questions.text: Fantasy: 'Field of Dreams'. Who plays 'Shoeless Joe'?
Action and Adventure: 'Spartacus'. Who does Spartacus fight in the gladiator arena?
questions.explanation:
Woody Strode.

	Ireland and Stone are fellow gladiators. McGraw plays the evil gladiator 'instructor'. Superbly done.

questions.text: Drama: 'From Here to Eternity'. Which future tv star had a bit part in the movie?
questions.explanation:
George Reeves.

	Reeves (Superman) as a soldier who warns Burt Lancaster about Deborah Kerr. Wonderful {movie;} great job by Clift.

questions.text: Love story: 'Casablanca'. Peter Lorre and Sydney Greenstreet are also in the movie - in which other Bogart film did they play prominent roles?
questions.explanation:
Maltese Falcon.

	It holds up well with time.
